OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Cost.label: Cost
Cost.tooltip: Base cost on using the command

CoolDown.label: Timer and Cooldown (seconds)
CoolDown.tooltip: Timer and global Cooldown in seconds.

OnCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Cooldown / Timer Response (whisper only)
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

NewBoop.value: {0}, someone has booped you in secret. Type {1} followed by a username to guess who booped you and win {2} {4}. You have {3} seconds, and only one guess!
NewBoop.label: Start Guessing message
NewBoop.tooltip:
{0} = guesser 
 {1} = command 
 {2} = payout 
 {3} = timer 
 {4} = currency name

CorrectGuess.value: {0}, that is correct! {1} was the one who booped you. You won {2} {3}
CorrectGuess.label: Correct Guess message

WrongGuess.value: {0}, that was a wrong guess. The person who booped you has received {2} {3}, in addition to the {4} they paid to boop you!
WrongGuess.label: Wrong Guess message
WrongGuess.tooltip:
{0} = guesser 
 {1} = booper 
 {2} = payout 
 {3} = currency name 
 {4} = cost

NoGuess.value: {0}, unfortunately, {1} seconds have passed, and you have not guessed! Too bad the one who booped you lost their points as well!
NoGuess.label: No Guess message

NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points! 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Currency name 
 {2} = command name 
 {3} = command cost
